name: Eart - The game where no one can cheat
name_original: Eart - The game where no one can cheat
description:
-Concept-

The development of this game is born with a simple but difficult concept to put in practice: preventing players from cheating. You can try it if you want, but I will not recommend it: Eart is a game where you can not go back ...

-Storyline-

A boy wakes up in a mysterious forest, with no memory of who and where he is. At the beginning, everything seems quiet, but soon he will realise he’s not alone…

-GAME FEATURES-

-Freedom to explore!
-Diary that recounts events
-Random encounters like an rpg
-Skill-based combat system
-So many secrets to be discovered...

-Beta-

This is a Beta version of Eart. So it's not a full game and can contain bugs. You can contact the creator at email DanOfficialGames@gmail.com or on Twitter: @DanGamesOff
This Beta is for windows.
